summary: "Shrek" is a 2001 animated comedy about an ogre named Shrek, voiced by Mike Myers, who lives in a swamp invaded by fairy tale characters. He teams up with a talking donkey (Eddie Murphy) to rescue Princess Fiona (Cameron Diaz) for Lord Farquaad (John Lithgow). Based on a book, the film was DreamWorks' first big hit, blending humor for kids and adults. It won an Oscar for Best Animated Feature and sparked three sequels and spin-offs. Its success made DreamWorks a major animation studio.
title: Shrek
